input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item features and item name.

Item name:
Spalding NBA 73952 Portable Basketball Hoop with 44 Inch Acrylic Backboard

Item features:
44 Inch steel framed acrylic backboard
The Slam jam breakaway rim is a 5/8 Inch heavy-duty solid steel rim. Includes a white, all-weather net.
The Ratchet lift provides rim height adjustment from 8 feet to 10 feet in 4-inch increments
Three pieces 3 Inch round pole
35-gallon capacity base filled with water or sand for stability
The portable Basketball Rim adjusts from 7.5 feet to 10 feet.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This adjustable sign holder is the perfect way to display your signs. The black, double-sided adjustable sign holder holds a printed 8.5" x 11" sign. Simply insert your sign between the non-glare lenses! The adjustable sign holder has a height range of 26" to 37.1" and features a shovel base that is flat. This sign holder is a great option for any store, restaurant, office, or event!
input_text.Response B: The Spalding NBA Portable Basketball hoop with 44-inch acrylic backboard is a great product for both beginners and advanced players alike. The hoop is easy to assemble and comes with a white, all-weather net. The base is 35-gallon capacity and can be filled with water or sand for added stability. The steel-framed backboard is 44 inches wide and the rim height adjusts from 7.5 feet to 10 feet. The Slam jam breakaway rim is a 5/8-inch heavy-duty solid steel rim. The Spalding NBA Portable Basketball hoop is a great choice for those who want a quality product that is easy to move and set up.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
